sections.title: Context & Role in Aegis IAM
sections.goal: Understand interviewee's responsibilities, current operational posture, and security priorities in IAM context
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your day-to-day responsibilities in the Aegis IAM project?
How do you ensure compliance with POL-SEC-001 in ongoing operations?
What are the most common security incidents you encounter in IAM?

sections.title: Threat Modeling & Access Controls
sections.goal: Explore how threats are identified, modeled, and mitigated, and how least privilege is enforced
sample_questions: What is your process for threat modeling new IAM features before deployment?
How do you balance usability and strict RBAC enforcement?
Can you give an example where JIT access prevented a potential breach?

sections.title: Cross-system Dependencies
sections.goal: Investigate dependencies between IAM and other Novereon systems, especially during incidents
sample_questions: How does Aegis IAM integrate with Orion Edge Gateway for authentication flows?
What happens to dependent systems like Helios Datalake if IAM is degraded?
Can you describe a past incident where IAM and Nimbus Observability had to coordinate?

sections.title: Runbooks & Incident Response
sections.goal: Understand the operational guidance and runbook usage in security incident handling
sample_questions: How often do you refer to RB-IAM-075 Access Revocation Emergency?
Can you walk me through a step you’ve modified in that runbook and why?
What’s the escalation path if revocation fails?

sections.title: Metrics, SLAs, and Continuous Improvement
sections.goal: Examine how performance, SLAs, and post-incident reviews drive security improvements
sample_questions: Which SLA or SLO metrics are most relevant for IAM security posture?
How do you feed incident learnings into RFC-903 Policy-as-Code conventions?
Have you ever had to propose SLA changes due to evolving threat landscapes?

sections.title: Tradeoffs & Future Risks
sections.goal: Discuss anticipated challenges, tradeoffs in design, and risk mitigation strategies
sample_questions: What tradeoffs have you made between speed of access provisioning and security rigor?
How do you foresee evolving compliance requirements affecting IAM architecture?
What’s the highest-impact risk you think we’re underestimating right now?
